text: How to Steal 2 Million is a 2011 South African action drama movie directed by Charlie Vundla and starring Menzi Ngubane, John Kani, Hlubi Mboya, Terry Pheto, Rapulana Seiphemo. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2011 drama movies Category:2011 action movies Category:South African drama movies Category:South African action movies Category:Movies set in South Africa
title: How to Steal 2 Million
